item.title: Hola Mundo | Creating Blog with Hugo and GitHub Pages 👷🏻‍♀️
item.description: This post shares the steps that I performed to build personal blog on GitHub Pages using Hugo theme.   <![if !supportLists]>I.               <![endif]>Create Hugo Site   cd ~/Documents hugo new site lluvia-blog   <![if !supportLists]>II.             <![endif]>Choose Hugo Theme & Clone + Edit Configuration File   cd themes git init git submodule add git@github.com:HEIGE-PCloud/DoIt.git DoIt   <![if !supportLists]>III.            <![endif]>Create New Post   cd ~/Documents cd lluvia-blog hugo new posts/my-first-post.md   <![if !supportLists]>IV.
